title: Close to major transit and buslines! Great location for commuters
posting_body: ['Apex Hudson Riverfront', 'Located at: 20 Water Grant St Yonkers, NY 10701', 'Featured unit: 1 bed | 1 bath | 718 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $2400 - $3113/month', 'Call Today!', '(914) 750-4858', "Find luxury and elegance at the Apex Hudson Riverfront's stylish studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes.", 'Overlooking the scenic greenery and tranquil waters of the Hudson River, Apex combines an upscale life with a natural point-of-view.', "Set on an idyllic 3.7-acre property, the building's modern design and amenities include a swimming pool, sky lounge, and state-of-the-art fitness center.", "Inside your home, you'll find gourmet kitchens featuring energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, modern cabinetry, subway tile backsplashes, high ceilings, and walk-in closets.", 'With an unbeatable location in close proximity to the affluence of restaurants and entertainment, these apartment homes in Yonkers, New York feature a live-work-play lifestyle.', "The community is within walking distance from the Yonkers Metro-North train station, and with a travel time to New York City of under 30 minutes, Apex is an NYC commuter's dream.", 'Come home to Apex Hudson Waterfront!', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '❉ Elevators', '❉ Fire Pits', '❉ Guest Suite', '❉ Hotel Style Lobby', '❉ Hudson River Views', '❉ Outdoor Grills', '❉ Resort Style Pool', '❉ Rooftop Sundeck', '❉ Business Center with Conference Rooms', '❉ Conveniently located near NYC & the George Washington Bridge', '❉ Interior Landscaped Courtyards', '❉ Luxurious Resident Lounge', '❉ Online Payments Available', '❉ State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '❉ Valet Dry Cleaning', 'Apartment Features!', '❉ Balcony and/or Patio', '❉ Custom 42" Cabinetry', '❉ Hardwood Flooring', '❉ In-Unit Washer & Dryer', '❉ Pool View In Select Units', '❉ Quartz Countertops', '❉ Stainless Steel Appliances', '❉ Tile Backsplashes', '❉ Walk-in Closet', '❉ City Views In Select Units', '❉ Courtyard View In Select Units', '❉ Hudson River Views In Select Units', '❉ Park Views In Select Units', '(914) 750-4858', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Cats and Dogs Allowed: We love furry companions and welcome up to two pets per apartment home.', 'Please take note of our weight and breed restrictions.', 'There is a one-time $500 fee for one pet and $1000 for two.', 'In addition, there is $60 per rent per pet each month.', 'Please contact our Leasing Office for more information.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A004125F4870472']
